name: Christmas Gift Pack with Tea
description:
This is a simple and easy gift for that hard-to-buy-for person, and with free shipping it couldn't be better. Includes three quality Queensland products:
  • Nucifora Tea 100g Lovingly grown in tropical North Queensland without the use of pesticides or herbicides
  • Honest Pete’s Marmalade from Bunnyconnellen 320g Made with local seville oranges and lemons. Silver Medal at the Original World Marmalade Awards UK.
  • Guest Workers' Pure Natural Honey from Bunnyconnellen 330g
  • Presented in a recycled and Australian made kraft box, carefully tied with cotton twill.
FREE SHIPPING

IMPORTANT: At the Paypal checkout where it says "Note to Seller" under the shipping address, please leave a message for the gift card, the recipient's contact phone number and delivery instructions if no-one is home, otherwise a calling card will be left.

name: Beer Box
description:
After tireless research we found the best craft beer to feature in our beer gift box. We landed upon one of Victoria’s finest handcrafted brews from Two Birds. This boutique beer hamper includes:
  • 2 bottles of Two Birds Golden Ale 330ml A handcrafted, full flavoured ale that is true to its name. It pours golden in colour, is strikingly bright and exhibits honey, spice and stone fruit characters.
  • Roasted Salted Macadamias 150g Lightly salted, crunchy macadamia nuts grown in Bundaberg.
  • Bunnyconnellen Bush Barbie Smoked Olives in Extra Virgin Olive Oil 240g These olives are handpicked, naturally cured and have a delicate flavour of Iron Bark smoke. Bronze Medal at the Sydney Royal Fine Food Show
  • 2 Zillpa rope coasters, handmade in Brisbane.
  • Presented in an Australian made handcrafted pine box. This can easily be reused as a storage box.


IMPORTANT: At the Paypal checkout where it says "Note to Seller" under the shipping address, please leave a message for the gift card, the recipient's contact phone number and delivery instructions if no-one is home, otherwise a calling card will be left.

name: Christmas Gift Basket
description:
20% OFF Now only $84. Gluten free option available. Please select below. Our Christmas Gift Basket includes:
  • Clovely Estate Brut Reserve 750ml from the South Burnett region, with a soft clean palate and some complex yeast characters it is the perfect way to celebrate Christmas.
  • Roasted Salted Macadamias 150g Lightly salted, crunchy macadamia nuts grown in Bundaberg.
  • A Ceramic Dish Handmade in Brisbane using Australian clay. Lead free and food safe. 9cm in diameter.
  • A Pudding Lane Christmas Pudding 500g Handmade from 100% Australian vine fruits, fresh butter, fresh local free range eggs, fresh bread crumbs, and matured brandy from the Barossa Valley. No artificial colours flavours or preservatives.
  • Three Ceramic Christmas Decorations with floral imprint, handmade in Brisbane exclusively for Homegrown Gifts.
  • Presented in a beautiful market basket with leather handles, handcrafted in Morocco.


IMPORTANT: At the Paypal checkout where it says "Note to Seller" under the shipping address, please leave a message for the gift card, the recipient's contact phone number and delivery instructions if no-one is home, otherwise a calling card will be left.

name: Pamper Basket
description:
This pamper gift basket includes everything she needs for a pampering bath:
  • Queen B Honeycomb Candle 10cm x 6cm 30 hours burn time (or 30 relaxing baths) handcrafted from 100% pure Australian beeswax to warm the room and purify the air
  • Thurlby Herb Farm Bathing Brew Three luxurious sachets of oatmeal and handmade soap chips in three botanical blends
  • Under the Fig Tree Organic Washer A beautifully soft organic cotton washer for a calming bath
  • Olive Skin Food Body Butter 250ml Capturing the beauty of nature by combining olive oil with 100% plant ingredients including Almond Oil and Shea Butter
  • Olive Oil Skin Food Hand & Nail Cream 125ml A soothing blend of olive oil, wheatgerm oil and vitamin E to nourish the skin
  • Lovingly presented in a cotton rope bowl handmade in Brisbane by Zillpa; it makes a beautiful addition to any home


IMPORTANT: At the Paypal checkout where it says "Note to Seller" under the shipping address, please leave a message for the gift card, the recipient's contact phone number and delivery instructions if no-one is home, otherwise a calling card will be left.

name: Perfect Bites Basket
description:
This gourmet gift basket is full of tasty bites; the best Queensland has to offer. Grab some fresh bread and it is ready to share with two dipping dishes and a bread board included. It also contains extra virgin olive oil, balsamic vinegar and dukkah for dipping and tapenade and lavoche for spreading.
  • Bunnyconnellen Celebration Cold Pressed Extra Virgin Olive Oil 500ml (Ballandean, Qld) Bronze Medal at the Sydney Royal Fine Food Show.
  • LiraH Australian Caramelised Balsamic Vinegar 375ml (Ballandean, Qld) Totally Australian in manufacture and style.
  • Fat Hen Farm Dukkah Egyptian Spice Mix 90g (Kilkivan, Qld) A crunchy blend of roasted spices, nuts and seeds makes this dukkah extremely versatile and especially delicious.
  • Bunnyconnellen Pétanque Smoked Tapenade (Ballandean, Qld) Handpicked, rough cut olives smoked to perfection. Bronze Medal at the Sydney Royal Fine Food Show.
  • The Simply Fine Food Company Organic Lavoche 60g (Currumbin Waters, Qld) 100% natural, certified organic baked lavoche.
  • Two Ceramic Dishes Handmade in Brisbane using Australian clay. They are lead free and food safe. 7cm and 9cm in diameter.
  • A Camphor Laurel Bread Board Handmade on the Sunshine Coast. It has natural anti-bacterial properties. Dimensions are 17cm x 27cm.
  • Presented in a beautiful market basket with leather handles, handcrafted in Morocco.


IMPORTANT: At the Paypal checkout where it says "Note to Seller" under the shipping address, please leave a message for the gift card, the recipient's contact phone number and delivery instructions if no-one is home, otherwise a calling card will be left.

name: Mum to be Basket
description:
This basket includes gifts for a deserving Mum and her baby:
  • Queen B Honeycomb Candle 10cm x 6cm 30 hours burn time (or 30 relaxing baths) handcrafted from 100% pure Australian beeswax to calm Mum and purify the air
  • Lily Loves Pearl Hand & Body Wash 200ml A blend of certified organic lemon myrtle, rosehip and calendula to lift the spirits and cleanse the skin. May also be used as a relaxing bath soak.
  • Lily Loves Pearl Nappy Crème 100ml A soothing blend of Certified Organic ingredients to treat delicate skin
  • Thurlby Herb Farm Bathing Brew Three luxurious sachets of oatmeal and handmade soap chips in three botanical blends
  • Under the Fig Tree Cube Rattle Handmade in Australia from fabric screen printed using non-toxic water based inks. Lightly filled with eco corn fibre making it easy for little hands to hold.
  • Presented in a beautiful market basket with leather handles, hand crafted in Morocco. She will want to use this again!

name: Baby Basket
description:
A perfect way to welcome a new baby into the world. This basket includes:
  • Three delicious baby lotions by Lily Loves Pearl - Baby moisturiser 125ml, Nappy Crème 100ml, and Baby Bottom Mist 125ml Each contains a gentle blend of Certified Organic ingredients to soothe delicate skin
  • Under the Fig Tree Washer A beautifully soft organic cotton washer for a calming bath
  • Under the Fig Tree Cube Rattle Handmade in Australia from fabric screen printed using non-toxic water based inks. Lightly filled with eco corn fibre making it easy for little hands to hold.

name: Breakfast Basket
description:

  • Nucifora Tea 100g Lovingly grown in tropical North Queensland without the use of pesticides or herbicides
  • Ewingsdale Coffee Estate Blend Plunger Grind 225g Organically grown in Byron Bay
  • Maple Muesli 500g (Gluten free option is 400g) Lightly baked in maple syrup and packed with nuts, seeds and fruit
  • Honest Pete’s Marmalade from Bunnyconnellen 320g Made with local seville oranges and lemons. Silver Medal at the Original World Marmalade Awards UK.

  • Flower Press Tea Towel 50cm x 70cm Designed and hand screen printed in Australia on a European linen tea towel using environmentally friendly ink

Available in three shapes. Please make your selection below.

This tea towel from Flower Press is designed and screen printed in Australia using environmentally friendly ink in Chalk White on glorious unbleached linen. Not only a beautiful natural colour but also gentler on the environment. These tea towels are 100% European linen, wonderful quality and they look great. Dimensions are 50cm x 70cm

name: Newborn Gift Pack
description:
The Newborn Gift Pack is a beautiful unisex baby shower or new baby gift and includes three essential baby items:
  • A Fourzero ultra soft and breathable organic bamboo and cotton baby beanie to fit babies from birth to 4 months with an adjustable knot and fold-over cuff.
  • A Fourzero organic bamboo and cotton single-layer wrap perfect for keeping baby snug in winter and also makes an ideal top layer sheet in summer.
  • A set of Fourzero organic bamboo and cotton scratch mittens, essential for every baby after birth. They help keep their little hands warm and stop them from hurting their delicate skin.
Fourzero products are all lovingly designed and handmade in Australia.
